answer: Deals-4Me is a smart grocery flyer and price comparison tool. You pick your favorite stores, save the items you care about, and we show you when and where they’re on sale.
Right now the focus is Region 1 (NE – New England). More regions will be added later, but NE is the only active region during early development.

patterns: how do i save an item
answer: To save an item, you’ll open a store flyer, click the product, and use the Save option. Saved items appear on your dashboard so you can see deals faster.
You'll be able to choose which grocery stores you want to follow. Deals-4Me then focuses only on those stores instead of showing every flyer in the region.
D4Mii (Deals-4Me Index) is the behind-the-scenes pricing system that tracks flyer data over time. It helps identify trends and eventually power smarter savings insights.
Deals-4Me will have a free Basic tier plus paid options as the platform grows. Basic allows limited saved items; higher tiers unlock more features and tracking.
